    • addNewAccomodationRule

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PostMapping("new") public AccomodationRuleModel addNewAccomodationRule(@RequestBody AccomodationRuleModel accomodationRuleToAdd)

    • updateAccomodationRule

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PutMapping("{accomodationRuleId}") public void updateAccomodationRule(@PathVariable("accomodationRuleId") String accomodationRuleId, @RequestBody AccomodationRuleModel accomodationRuleToUpdate)

    • deleteAccomodationRuleById

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @DeleteMapping("{accomodationRuleId}") public void deleteAccomodationRuleById(@PathVariable("accomodationRuleId") String accomodationRuleId)

    • findById

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_BASE_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("{accomodationRuleId}") public AccomodationRuleModel findById(@PathVariable("accomodationRuleId") String accomodationRuleId)

    • findByAccomodationRegNumber

    • addRuleToAccomodation

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PostMapping("{regNumber}/new") public AccomodationAccRuleModel addRuleToAccomodation(@PathVariable(name="regNumber") String regNumber, @RequestParam(name="rule") String accomodationRuleId)

    • deleteAccomodationRuleFromAccomodation

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @DeleteMapping("{regNumber}/{accomodationRuleId}") public void deleteAccomodationRuleFromAccomodation(@PathVariable(name="regNumber") String regNumber, @PathVariable(name="accomodationRuleId") String accomodationRuleId)
